channel.title: Free Website Template
channel.description:
So, I made this template for Prothieum, turns out Adam doesn't want it because he's a complete and utter twat. Do what you want with it, just don't touch the copyrights other than Prothieum, of course.
Yes, the slide images are from Pulsescape, I never had time to take any of my own, I've given them place in the copyright footer, so shut the fuck up.
Features; - An easy to use, easy to understand system. - Fully functioning Cu3on slider. - Simple but effective layout and presentation. - Easy to edit files, so it's easy to customise to your liking, even for a newb.
[b]YOU MUST NOT CLAIM THIS AS YOUR OWN WORK, DON'T BE A CUNT.[/b]
Media; [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/35ippgg.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/20g0guv.png[/img]
Download Package; http://prothieum.org/demo/grey/greythemedsite.rar Live demo; http://prothieum.org/demo/grey/
Hopefully someone can enjoy this and appreciate it.

@deathschaos9 wrote:

I’ve compared this download to the download provided at http://www.towfiqi.com/template/calliope/ and they match almost 100%

If you’re going to release work that doesn’t belong to you be sure to properly accredit those who actually did the work.

item.title: Free Website Template
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Arcik:

its not breaking the law for using a template that open to the public. Copywrite removal is allowed with that specfic template.

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
oh, quote what the author specified then o.o?

[quote=“Travas, post:84, topic:442285”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=544922.msg3994439#msg3994439 date=1337073833]
YOU MUST NOT CLAIM THIS AS YOUR OWN WORK, DON’T BE A CUNT.
[/quote]

You’re the cunt, you’re the one saying this is yours.

[quote author=Ruby link=topic=544922.msg3994439#msg3994439 date=1337073833]
So, I made this template for Prothieum, turns out Adam doesn’t want it because he’s a complete and utter twat. Do what you want with it, just don’t touch the copyrights other than Prothieum, of course.[/quote]

You didn’t make anything. He probably didn’t want it because he knew you just downloaded if from the web, which makes you the twat. I will touch the copyrights, because #1 they are legally binding, and #2 you changed them in the first place.[/quote]

[quote=“l0gik, post:7, topic:442286”]right now i feel pretty bad for you ruby, kind of looks like you even stole this http://www.globalsynergydesign.com/
and just changed the background, got rid of the navigation bar image at top, and then stretched the footer background for the prothieum site

and yeah, again

Template by Ruby.

that’s two websites you’ve stolen[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Free Website Template
item.dc:creator: @ForsaKenX0 ForsaKenX0
item.description:
@ForsaKenX0 wrote:

[quote=“l0gik, post:6, topic:442286”][quote author=Arcik link=topic=544922.msg4029459#msg4029459 date=1340618113]

Ruby’s converted this if you actually download both and have alook.

Either way, she said she created it, and told us to not change copyright acting as if it was all hers. Which none of the displayed HTML is. If that isn’t a leech, then I don’t know what it.

The template gave permission for your own copywrite. Ruby edited added his own copywrite since like 99% is his work (conversion and making it useable for youguys).
[/quote]conversion? conversion of what? and making it usable? i just downloaded the original, seems just as usable as the one that ruby posted, i see nothing that would require work put into it that ruby has done.[/quote]
This guy^ He’s right, she did nothing to this, other then changing a few images, names, etc. I thought Ruby was one of the decent template makers here, but now not so much. And her saying she made it from scratch was pretty stupid. Everyone finds the original release if you leech it. Always do, always will.

Read full topic

item.title: Free Website Template
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:64, topic:442285”][quote author=RevengePK link=topic=544922.msg3999905#msg3999905 date=1337820955]

RevengePk - 3 hours? This is including the image creation?

Yes, it takes honestly 2 seconds to make the gradient I need. Also, every image i make except the small ones I tweak to fit the template I save in a folder for easy access. I may release a portion of them soon. Also, for bg images some times I use subtlepatterns because they have awesome patterns. You also have to take into consideration that I make 1 page templates for people to build off of.

[img]http://imageking.us/images/fkn6.jpg[/mg]
[/quote]

Are those images you use copyrighted?[/quote]

No.

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:62, topic:442285”]@RevengePK

your having a cow over the fact the example template they give does not include a tag? seriously? read the next lesson…it gives a list of other tags that can be used which includes the one.[/quote]

No, I’m having a cow about the fact they supply false information even with the simplest things.

Read full topic
